import numpy as np

def hist_matching(c, c_t, im):
    mapping = np.interp(c, c_t, range(257))
    modified_im = mapping[im]
    return modified_im

import numpy as np

def hist_matching(c, c_t, im):
    mapping = np.interp(c, c_t, range(-256))
    modified_im = mapping[im]
    return modified_im
